name: Action
title: War
description: An action-packed thriller with a tense battle between two spies, combining wits and strength in high-stakes encounters.

name: Comedy
title: 3 Idiots
description: A heartwarming comedy exploring the lives of three friends as they navigate the pressures of engineering college life.

name: Drama
title: Gully Boy
description: A young street rapper from Mumbai dreams of making it big, navigating his way through challenges and aspirations.

name: Horror
title: Bhul Bhulaiya
description: A psychologist delves into a haunted palace's mystery, confronting a female spirit in this thrilling horror-comedy.

name: Animation
title: Hanuman
description: Join Hanuman on a heroic adventure as he rescues Princess Sita in this captivating animated epic tale.

name: Romance
title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
description: A timeless romance where love transcends cultural barriers, bringing together hearts in a classic tale of passion.

name: Thriller
title: Andhadhun
description: A blind pianist becomes entangled in a gripping murder mystery, navigating danger and deception in a thrilling narrative.

name: Fantasy
title: Baahubali: The Beginning
description: An epic fantasy saga of power, betrayal, and valor unfolds in an ancient kingdom with majestic storytelling.

name: Documentary
title: Sachin: A Billion Dreams
description: Experience Sachin Tendulkar's iconic journey through this cinematic tribute, capturing the spirit of cricket's living legend.

name: Romance
title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
description: A group of friends embarks on a memorable trek, friendship, and self-discovery along their adventurous journey.

name: Biography
title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
description: The inspirational journey of Indian athlete Milkha Singh, from struggle to triumph, is vividly portrayed in this biographical film.

name: Musical
title: Rockstar
description: A young musician's journey through fame, love, and self-discovery in the Indian music industry forms this musical drama.

name: Adventure
title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
description: Three friends embark on a road trip across Spain, rediscovering life, friendship, and their deepest desires in this exhilarating adventure.

name: Crime
title: Gangs of Wasseypur
description: A gripping saga of power, revenge, and family legacy in the coal mafia of Wasseypur, spanning generations of conflict and ambition.

name: Science Fiction
title: Krrish 3
description: A superhero battles against an evil genius who creates a powerful army of mutants in this high-octane sci-fi adventure.

name: Mystery
title: Kahaani
description: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband leads her through a labyrinth of secrets and deceit in the heart of Kolkata.

name: Historical
title: Jodhaa Akbar
description: An epic romance between Emperor Akbar and Rajput princess Jodhaa, showcasing their enduring love amidst political and cultural challenges.

name: Romantic Comedy
title: Jab We Met
description: A heartwarming journey of self-discovery and romance unfolds when a businessman meets a free-spirited woman on a train journey.

name: Romantic Comedy
title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
description: A hilarious romantic comedy about a lovable yet clumsy young man who goes to great lengths to win the heart of the woman he loves.

name: Fantasy
title: PK
description: An alien stranded on Earth explores human society with innocence and wit, questioning religious dogma and societal norms in a comedic narrative.

name: Drama
title: Barfi!
description: A charming and mischievous deaf-mute man navigates love and friendship with two women, defying societal expectations and embracing life's joys.

name: Sports
title: Chak De! India
description: An exiled hockey player returns as a coach to lead the Indian women's team to victory, overcoming societal prejudice and personal demons.

name: War
title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
description: Based on true events, this film follows the Indian Army's covert operation to avenge a deadly terrorist attack on a military base.

name: Thriller
title: Genius
description: An intelligence officer uses his wit and resources to battle a catastrophic terrorist attack, unraveling a sinister conspiracy.
